name: Chartwell Manor (Adventuron Game)
description:
There is a killer on the loose! You are trapped in an old abandoned manor where a man was once murdered, he will help you find who murdered him! But beware the killer is on your trail! You must find and kill the murderer and get justice for your new ghastly friend! You will be faced with a set of challenges that you must overcome. You will be forced to search the manor for all sorts of trinkets that could help you on your journey but be cautious as the killer laid traps!

Interested in making a game like this?  Have a look at: https://adventuron.io/

Uploaded as part of the ITEM course at BISW.
